text: oṭṭakattil ninn raṇṭ iṇakaḷeyuṁ, paśuvargattil ninn raṇṭ iṇakaḷeyuṁ(avan sr̥ṣṭiccu.) paṟayuka: (ava raṇṭileyuṁ) āṇvargaṅṅaḷeyāṇēā, peṇvargaṅṅaḷeyāṇēā atumalla peṇvargaṅṅaḷuṭe garbhāśayaṅṅaḷ uḷkeāṇṭatineyāṇēā allāhu niṣid'dhamākkiyiṭṭuḷḷat‌? alla, allāhu niṅṅaḷēāṭ iteākke upadēśicca sandarbhattin niṅṅaḷ sākṣikaḷāyiṭṭuṇṭēā? appēāḷ oru aṟivumillāte janaṅṅaḷe piḻappikkān vēṇṭi allāhuvinṟe pēril kaḷḷaṁ keṭṭiccamaccavanekkāḷ valiya akrami āruṇṭ‌? akramikaḷāya āḷukaḷe allāhu nērvaḻiyilēkk nayikkukayilla; tīrcca
